title: [Large-Scale] Active Response Learning Design for Strengthening Conceptual Understanding

context.additional_context: Asynchronous learning environment using digital devices, with minimal learner-to-learner interaction.

learning_goals: Learners can classify examples and non-examples of mathematical concepts with 80% accuracy.
Learners achieve 20% higher performance in concept application problems than in concept definition recall.
Learners demonstrate a 15% improvement in concept comprehension through weekly quizzes.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
